page.title: 08CLUBS-LLANFECHAIN FOOTBALL
page.content: The football club was founded in 1920 The first game they played was at Plas-yn_Dinas field. The first manager was J.R Jones (chairman).The colours are blue and white stripe's Montgowery Amoteur League secretary was Reg Jones Montgomery -League secretary O.P. Evans.Over the years several cups have been won.Andrew Wilding, Alan William's, Delwyn Thomas, Gwyn Davies, Gwyn Davies, Ian Furniss, John Fizgerald, Gary Lewis, Gwynfor Thomas, Terence Williams. The substitute's are Keith Davies and Bryn Jones. They play on a Tuesday Thursday and on a Saturday.The goalkeeper wear's a green top and black short's. The colour of their number on their back is white. Every August a summer knockout game is played by local team's.
